Description: Assumption of the Virgin with angels and cherubim, the Dove of the Holy Spirit above Pen and brown ink, brown wash,
Curator's comments: The traditional attribution to Guidobono could well be correct since the flowing, loose pen contours and the broad application of wash go well with drawings by him such as the 'Rest on the Flight into Egypt' in the Palazzo Rosso, Genoa (D 2367), and the 'Grillo arms with Minerva and Fame' in the Istituto Nazionale per la Grafica, Rome (F.N. 12382), M. Newcome, 'Bartolomeo e Domenico Guidobono', Turin, 2002, nos. D2 and D4 respectively, pp. 145 and 147
